about.title: About Ec stem
about.subtitle: Nurturing tomorrow's innovators through hands-on STEM education
about.description: Ec stem is an early childhood (4-6 years old) enrichment provider dedicated to making STEM — Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics — fun, hands-on, and meaningful for young learners. Through structured, age-appropriate programmes, children explore and create using interactive kits that spark curiosity and build essential skills like problem-solving, creativity, and teamwork. Aligned with the MOE NEL Framework, Ec stem delivers engaging learning experiences that nurture confident, curious, and future-ready innovators from a young age.

programs.title: Our STEM Programs
programs.subtitle: Age-appropriate STEM learning experiences designed for every stage of development

toddler.title: Early Explorers
toddler.description: Children explore building blocks, learning to interlock pieces and create simple structures. Focused on fine motor skills, problem-solving, and curiosity, this stage lays the foundation for hands-on STEM learning.

preK.title: Curious Creators
preK.description: Children use simple tools like screws to connect blocks securely, developing coordination, precision, and early engineering thinking. Creativity and collaboration are nurtured through guided and open-ended construction challenges.

kindergarten.title: Super Solvers
kindergarten.description: Children engage with gears and mechanisms, exploring a new mechanism concept in each lesson. Hands-on experimentation builds problem-solving, critical thinking, and engineering understanding in a fun, interactive way.

services.title: Why Choose Ec stem?
services.subtitle: Building strong partnerships for quality early childhood STEM education

curriculum.title: Holistic Curriculum
curriculum.description: Aligned with NEL Framework and MOE standards
points: Lesson plans are aligned with the NEL Framework, MOE

satisfaction.description: Visible learning outcomes that parents love

aboutPage.subtitle: Ec stem is an early childhood (4-6 years old) enrichment provider dedicated to making STEM — Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics — fun, hands-on, and meaningful for young learners. Through structured, age-appropriate programmes, children explore and create using interactive kits that spark curiosity and build essential skills like problem-solving, creativity, and teamwork. Aligned with the MOE NEL Framework, Ec stem delivers engaging learning experiences that nurture confident, curious, and future-ready innovators from a young age.
aboutPage.slogan: Think like a scientist. Solve problems like an engineer.

mission.title: Our Mission & Vision
mission.missionText: To make STEM learning fun, hands-on, and full of discovery. We nurture curious minds and build confident young creators who love to explore, experiment, and innovate.
mission.visionText: To inspire every child to think like an inventor — equipped with the creativity, confidence, and practical skills to turn ideas into reality.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: These values guide our approach to serving childcare centres and developing STEM programs for young learners.

curiosity.title: Curiosity First
curiosity.description: We nurture natural curiosity by encouraging children to ask questions, explore ideas, and discover through hands-on experiences. Every 'why?' opens a door to deeper understanding.

understanding.title: Create Beyond
understanding.description: We empower children to go beyond observation and become creators. Through design thinking and problem-solving, they learn to build solutions and bring their ideas to life.

handsMinds.title: Think & Build
handsMinds.description: We believe in learning by doing. Children develop critical thinking and engineering skills as they construct, test, and refine their creations, building confidence along the way.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Bringing cutting-edge STEM education to early childhood learning environments.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Delivering the highest quality STEM programs and professional development.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: Building strong collaborative relationships with childcare centres and educators.

safety.title: Safety
safety.description: Ensuring all programs meet the highest safety standards for young learners.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Making quality STEM education accessible to every childcare centre.

impact.title: Impact
impact.description: Creating meaningful learning experiences that inspire lifelong curiosity.

founder.title: A Message from Our Founder
founder.quote:
I firmly believe that gamified exploration is the key to igniting a lifelong passion for learning. At Ec stem, guided by Singapore's NEL Framework, we meticulously design every curriculum to transform children's curiosity into the ability to solve real-world problems, empowering them to become the creators of tomorrow.

I look forward to collaborating with visionary principals and educators to lay a dynamic and solid foundation for children's future.
founder.name: Ms Huang
founder.description: An innovator deeply rooted in early childhood education, dedicated to seamlessly integrating forward-thinking STEM education concepts into Singapore's kindergarten classrooms.

team.title: Meet Our Expert Team
team.subtitle: Our passionate team combines deep expertise in early childhood development with cutting-edge STEM knowledge.

msHuang.name: Teacher Clairabel
msHuang.description: With a diploma in Early childhood and ECDA Commendation award recipient, Clairabel strives to nurture the young explorers by equipping them with creativity, confidence and practical skills through STEM activities. She believes that no idea is too small and no problem too big. She aspires to take learning to greater heights through the stem curriculum.

jennifer.name: Teacher Wan Rong
jennifer.description: A dedicated educator with a Diploma in Early Childhood Education and undergraduate in BSc Psychology. With five years of experience in the early childhood field, she believes in lifelong learning and in nurturing each child's natural curiosity and love for learning. She values meaningful play as a powerful foundation for developing essential 21st century skills such as problem solving, collaboration, and creativity, which help children build the executive functioning skills needed for future success.

david.name: Teacher Jayne
david.description: With a Professional Diploma in Early Childhood Care and Education (Childcare) and over 8 years of experience in the early childhood field, Jayne is passionate about nurturing young minds through hands-on learning. She believes that children learn best by exploring and experiencing the world around them. To her, learning should be fun and enjoyable, sparking curiosity and cultivating a lifelong love for discovery. Jayne is dedicated to supporting children in developing confidence, problem-solving skills, and a sense of wonder as they explore the world of STEM.

flynne.name: Teacher Flynne
flynne.description: Flynne is passionate about sparking young minds and cultivating their natural curiosity through STEM programmes. She fosters critical thinking and problem-solving skills while encouraging exploration and creativity. By embracing STEM education, Flynne aims to inspire confidence, foster a love for learning, and support the holistic development of every child under her care.

programmesPage.title: STEM Enrichment Programs
programmesPage.subtitle: Nurture curiosity, creativity, and critical thinking in preschoolers.
programmesPage.description: Our STEM Enrichment Programs are play-based and aligned with the MOE NEL Framework, designed for children aged 4-6 years old. We integrate STEM learning into your existing curriculum for suitable ages.

flexible.description: Weekly enrichment program, parental engagement activity, stem week, events/celebration, holiday program

curiousCreators.title: Curious Creators
curiousCreators.description: Children use simple tools like screws to connect blocks securely, developing coordination, precision, and early engineering thinking. Creativity and collaboration are nurtured through guided and open-ended construction challenges.

superSolvers.title: Super Solvers
superSolvers.description: Children engage with gears and mechanisms, exploring a new mechanism concept in each lesson. Hands-on experimentation builds problem-solving, critical thinking, and engineering understanding in a fun, interactive way.

playBased.title: Children Learn Science Through Play
playBased.description: Every build becomes a discovery: bridges teach balance, cars teach motion, and towers teach structure and stability.
playBased.quote: We make STEM concepts come alive — one LEGO brick at a time.

zeroPrep.title: Zero Prep for Teachers — We Handle Everything

items.kits: Complete lesson kits and LEGO® sets

zeroPrep.quote: We bring everything your centre needs — lessons, materials, and the smiles.

engaging.title: Parent-Engaging & School-Enhancing
engaging.description: Each class ends with a tangible creation that children can proudly share. We also provide photo and story templates for your school's Facebook, newsletter, or parent communications.
engaging.benefit: Boost parent satisfaction and showcase your preschool's innovation.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions from childcare centres about our STEM education services. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact us directly!

whatIsEcStem.question: What is Ec stem and what do you do?
whatIsEcStem.answer: Ec stem is Singapore's trusted partner for early childhood STEM education. We provide specialized robotics training, hands-on science programs, and comprehensive STEM enrichment services directly to childcare centres across Singapore.

howItWorks.question: How does the partnership with childcare centres work?
howItWorks.answer: We work closely with childcare centres to integrate age-appropriate STEM programs into their existing curriculum. Our experienced educators visit your centre regularly to deliver engaging, hands-on learning experiences that complement your educational goals.

whyChooseUs.question: Why should we choose Ec stem over other education providers?
whyChooseUs.answer: We specialize exclusively in early childhood STEM education with experienced educators, age-appropriate curriculum, proven track record with childcare centres, and ongoing support. Our programs are designed specifically for young learners aged 18 months to 6 years.

safetyConcerns.question: Are your STEM programs safe for young children?
safetyConcerns.answer: Absolutely! All our programs use age-appropriate, child-safe materials and equipment. Our educators are trained in early childhood development and safety protocols. We ensure every activity meets the highest safety standards for young learners.

costEffective.question: Is it cost-effective to partner with Ec stem?
costEffective.answer: Yes! Partnering with us is more cost-effective than hiring specialized STEM staff. You get expert educators, curriculum, materials, and ongoing support without the overhead costs of recruitment, training, and resource management.

getStarted.question: How can we get started with Ec stem?
getStarted.answer: Simply contact us for a free consultation! We'll discuss your centre's needs, explain our programs, and arrange a trial session. There's no obligation, and we'll work with you to create a customized STEM education plan for your centre.

centresPage.title: Our Centres

centresPage.findUsSubtitle: All our centres are conveniently located with excellent transport links and parking facilities.

centresPage.chooseLocationSubtitle: Each centre offers the same high-quality education with unique features tailored to the local community.

about.title: About Ec stem
about.description: Leading early childhood STEM education provider, inspiring young minds through innovative learning experiences and partnerships with childcare centres.

learningBuddy.title: Meet our Learning Buddy
learningBuddy.storyDescription: The Learning Buddy was made in a little workshop where a team of builders wanted to create a friend who loves learning all the time. They put together helpful sensors, a bright smart brain, and a spark of imagination.
learningBuddy.description: Ec stem brings K1, designed by Booster, into the classroom to immerse young thinkers with the experience of co-learning with an autonomous artificial intelligent robot.
learningBuddy.partnersDescription: Our collaboration with Booster brings the latest robotics to co-learn with the children across preschools. This partnership allows children to experience first hand learning and interactive with our learning buddy to build confidence and compassion while exploring real-world technology.
learningBuddy.partnersTagline: Together, we're nurturing future-ready creators by combining Ec stem's pedagogy and Booster's robotics innovation.

forParentsPage.title: For Enrichment Centre
forParentsPage.subtitle: Discover how our STEM programs nurture children's curiosity, creativity, and critical thinking through hands-on learning experiences.

learningOutcomes.title: Learning Outcomes
learningOutcomes.description: Our age-appropriate programs are designed to build essential skills and foster a love for learning at every stage of your child's development.

n2.title: Early Explorers
n2.description: At this explorer stage, your child will engage in playful learning by exploring building blocks, enhancing their ability to interlock pieces and create simple structures. This hands-on experience is crafted to develop their fine motor skills, ignite problem-solving capabilities, and nurture their natural curiosity. By focusing on these key areas, we aim to lay a strong foundation for future STEM learning.

k1.title: Curious Creators
k1.description: At this creator stage, we provide a dynamic environment where your child engages with simple tools to securely connect blocks. This hands-on experience enhances their coordination, precision, and fosters early engineering skills. Our program is designed to nurture creativity and collaboration through both guided and open-ended construction challenges.

k2.title: Super Solvers
k2.description: At this solver stage, our program is designed to engage your child with hands-on experimentation that cultivates problem-solving, critical thinking, and engineering understanding. Each lesson introduces a new mechanism concept, allowing your child to explore gears and mechanisms in a fun, interactive way. Through exploration and play, we build a strong foundation for future learning and innovation.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: 1 hour per session *timing may vary based on programs

flexible.title: Flexible Model
flexible.description: Weekly enrichment / Holiday Camps / Themed Activities

materials.title: All Materials Provided
materials.description: Complete set up by our team

whyParentsLove.title: Why Do Parents Love Us
whyParentsLove.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied parents who have seen their children thrive through our STEM programs.

development.title: Boost Child's Development
development.description: Our STEM curriculum fosters essential 21st-century skills such as critical thinking, collaboration, and creativity. We nurture positive attitudes towards science, mathematics, and problem-solving.

realWorld.title: Real World Applications
realWorld.description: Our programs provide practical, real-world experiences by exploring a variety of engaging topics. These activities connect their interests to everyday applications, fostering a deeper comprehension of the world around them.

robot.title: First Ever Robot Experience
robot.description: Our child-sized robot, Robo, acts as both a learning companion and teaching aid, enriching your child's educational journey.

facilitators.title: Qualified Facilitators
facilitators.description: Our team comprises experienced ex-preschool teachers dedicated to meeting the diverse learning needs of every child.

quality.title: Guaranteed High Quality
quality.description: We offer small class sizes, a high-quality curriculum, and exceptional learning materials to ensure an outstanding experience for your child.

nel.title: 100% Aligned with Singapore's NEL Framework
nel.intro: Our lessons reinforce key learning areas:

items.discovery: Discovery of the World — exploring how things work
items.motor: Motor Skills Development — fine motor skills, eye hand coordination

forParentsPage.motto: Think like a scientist, solve problems like an engineer.
